00034  * Lustre is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00035  *
00036  * lustre/obdclass/linux/linux-obdo.c
00037  *
00038  * Object Devices Class Driver
00039  * These are the only exported functions, they provide some generic
00040  * infrastructure for managing object devices
00041  */
00042 
00043 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS
00044 
00045 #include <linux/fs.h>
00046 #include <linux/module.h>
00047 #include <linux/pagemap.h> /* for PAGE_CACHE_SIZE */
00048 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00049 #include <obd_class.h>
00050 
00051 /*FIXME: Just copy from obdo_from_inode*/
00052 void obdo_from_la(struct obdo *dst, const struct lu_attr *la, u64 valid)
00053 {
00054         u64 newvalid = 0;
00055 
00056         if (valid & LA_ATIME) {
00057                 dst->o_atime = la->la_atime;
00058                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLATIME;
00059         }
00060         if (valid & LA_MTIME) {
00061                 dst->o_mtime = la->la_mtime;
00062                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLMTIME;
00063         }
00064         if (valid & LA_CTIME) {
00065                 dst->o_ctime = la->la_ctime;
00066                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLCTIME;
00067         }
00068         if (valid & LA_SIZE) {
00069                 dst->o_size = la->la_size;
00070                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLSIZE;
00071         }
00072         if (valid & LA_BLOCKS) {  /* allocation of space (x512 bytes) */
00073                 dst->o_blocks = la->la_blocks;
00074                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLBLOCKS;
00075         }
00076         if (valid & LA_TYPE) {
00077                 dst->o_mode = (dst->o_mode & S_IALLUGO) |
00078                               (la->la_mode & S_IFMT);
00079                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLTYPE;
00080         }
00081         if (valid & LA_MODE) {
00082                 dst->o_mode = (dst->o_mode & S_IFMT) |
00083                               (la->la_mode & S_IALLUGO);
00084                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLMODE;
00085         }
00086         if (valid & LA_UID) {
00087                 dst->o_uid = la->la_uid;
00088                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLUID;
00089         }
00090         if (valid & LA_GID) {
00091                 dst->o_gid = la->la_gid;
00092                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLGID;
00093         }
00094         if (valid & LA_FLAGS) {
00095                 dst->o_flags = la->la_flags;
00096                 newvalid |= OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
00097         }
00098         dst->o_valid |= newvalid;
00099 }
00100 EXPORT_SYMBOL(obdo_from_la);
00101 
00102 /*FIXME: Just copy from obdo_from_inode*/
00103 void la_from_obdo(struct lu_attr *dst, const struct obdo *obdo, u64 valid)
00104 {
00105         u64 newvalid = 0;
00106 
00107         valid &= obdo->o_valid;
00108 
00109         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLATIME) {
00110                 dst->la_atime = obdo->o_atime;
00111                 newvalid |= LA_ATIME;
00112         }
00113         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLMTIME) {
00114                 dst->la_mtime = obdo->o_mtime;
00115                 newvalid |= LA_MTIME;
00116         }
00117         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLCTIME) {
00118                 dst->la_ctime = obdo->o_ctime;
00119                 newvalid |= LA_CTIME;
00120         }
00121         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLSIZE) {
00122                 dst->la_size = obdo->o_size;
00123                 newvalid |= LA_SIZE;
00124         }
00125         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLBLOCKS) {
00126                 dst->la_blocks = obdo->o_blocks;
00127                 newvalid |= LA_BLOCKS;
00128         }
00129         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLTYPE) {
00130                 dst->la_mode = (dst->la_mode & S_IALLUGO) |
00131                                (obdo->o_mode & S_IFMT);
00132                 newvalid |= LA_TYPE;
00133         }
00134         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLMODE) {
00135                 dst->la_mode = (dst->la_mode & S_IFMT) |
00136                                (obdo->o_mode & S_IALLUGO);
00137                 newvalid |= LA_MODE;
00138         }
00139         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLUID) {
00140                 dst->la_uid = obdo->o_uid;
00141                 newvalid |= LA_UID;
00142         }
00143         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLGID) {
00144                 dst->la_gid = obdo->o_gid;
00145                 newvalid |= LA_GID;
00146         }
00147         if (valid & OBD_MD_FLFLAGS) {
00148                 dst->la_flags = obdo->o_flags;
00149                 newvalid |= LA_FLAGS;
00150         }
00151         dst->la_valid = newvalid;
00152 }
00153 EXPORT_SYMBOL(la_from_obdo);
